enum16.name: Glance Behavior
enum16.tooltip: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

enum16.name: Glance Recipient Behavior
enum16.tooltip: how does someone who hears me behave?

float32.name: Sound Repetition Delay
float32.tooltip: Minimum delay time between playing the same permutation

float32.name: Allowable Queue Delay
float32.tooltip: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

float32.name: Pre Vocalization Delay
float32.tooltip: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

float32.name: Notification Delay
float32.tooltip: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

float32.name: Post Vocalization Delay
float32.tooltip: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

float32.name: Repeat Delay
float32.tooltip: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

float32.name: Weight
float32.tooltip: Inherent weight of this vocalization

float32.name: Speaker Freeze Time
float32.tooltip: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

float32.name: Listener Freeze Time
float32.tooltip: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)

enum16.tooltip: The relationship between the subject and the cause

enum16.tooltip: Speaker must have danger level of at least this much
